This application is intended for training purpose. If you intend to use this application in hunting, check first your local game law for legal use. The calls are intended to call in coyotes from all kinds of hunting situations. Best results are achieved with an external speaker connected to your phones audio jack.

To play a call, tap the button with the desired sound. It will then start playing until you hit it again or select another call.

How to call
There are many ways of calling in Coyotes, but the basics is to imitate the sound of an animal in distress.

A typical calling scheme might look like this:

1 min High pitch squeal
1 min -- silence --
1 min Jackrabbit
1 min -- silence --
1 min Jackrabbit
1 min -- silence --
1 min Coyote Howler
1 min -- silence --
1 min Coyote Howler
1 min -- silence --
1 min Hurt Puppy

You might want to vary the calling and experiment a little bit. Online there are also good resources if you search for coyote hunting or coyote calling.

Some good advice for successful coyote hunting is to use good camouflage and cover scent.

It is also good not to start calling immediately with you come to a new scene. Setup your gear and familiarize yourself with the environment first for about 15-30 minutes before you start the call.

Good luck!
